overview: In this heartfelt, slightly absurd comedy, two sisters dig up their dead motherâ€™s grave in order to take back what they believe is rightfully theirs. The driven Blaine had such a complicated relationship with their mother that she is desperate to the point of obsession. Amy, in turn, just wants to be with her sister; her quick wit and carefree attitude have made it difficult to connect with Blaine. When they hear a rustle in the bushes and a tiny gun, the two must contend with the emotional stakes and physical exhaustion.
title: The Grave
